To escape, Yuri must uncover the truth behind Gnosia and the time loop itself‚Äîbefore it‚Äôs too late.

But just as she‚Äôs about to lose hope, the crown prince of Aquasteed proposes instead. Could this unexpected turn finally lead to a happy ending of her own?

releases.title: Digimon Beatbreak

Accounts from survivors combine with cockpit recordings and computer images to weave the gripping tales, and expert testimony reveals the hows and whys behind the events, some of which have resulted in important changes to aviation safety and regulations.

releases.title: Journal with Witch

As they navigate grief, clashing personalities, and the challenges of living together, the two slowly open their hearts to each other, discovering warmth, understanding, and the meaning of family.

releases.title: Kaya-chan Isn't Scary

releases.title: Oedo Fire Slayer -The Legend of Phoenix-

releases.title: Mi Xiao Circle School Notes

releases.title: The Trek

Here, they are listened to, supported, helped and believed. Diane, Manon, In√®s, Awa and the others will give them a helping hand until they can stand up again. As a team. Even if it means risking their own equilibrium.

releases.title: Mavka. A Real Myth

releases.title: Werewolf Hunt
releases.synopsis: A cadre of the world's most skilled hunters track the ultimate in big game - a Werewolf.

releases.title: Dinosaur Hunt
releases.synopsis: A rich family are brought together to a remote island for a reunion, only to learn that their father has been experimenting with dinosaurs in an attempt to find a cure for his disease. This family are forced to work together when the dinosaurs escape.

releases.title: Molly vs. THE MACHINES
releases.synopsis: From a teenager‚Äôs suburban bedroom to the boardrooms of Silicon Valley, this is a story of a heartbroken father‚Äôs quest to uncover the truth behind his daughter's death and his fightback against how the most powerful corporations of the modern age operate.

releases.title: Castration Movie Expansion Pack i. You're Weird, But I Love You!
releases.synopsis: A feature length deleted scenes featurette from the blu-ray release of the anthology series "Castration Movie"

releases.title: Les enfants perdus 1. La petite fille
Conversio
releases.synopsis: Conversio: Turning inward, into the depths of our being, to find God.  Alice and Charles have known each other since childhood and once made a promise they believed unbreakable: ‚ÄúAlways and forever‚Äù But after a tragic event, Charles withdraws into a silent suffering that he can no longer express except through violence. After repeated and unsuccessful attempts to help him, Alice is confronted with a painful choice: should she honor her promise, or listen to her reason?  This short film sheds light on the dilemma faced by victims of domestic violence, when giving up on saving the other becomes the only way to save oneself.

releases.title: Murder in the Highland Manor
releases.synopsis: Kate takes a job as a live-in tutor at a secluded Scottish estate for a mother and daughter who‚Äôve escaped domestic abuse. But when she discovers the previous au pair mysteriously disappeared, Kate becomes embroiled in the family‚Äôs deadly secrets.

releases.title: Psalms of the People
releases.synopsis: The film follows musician Rob MacNeacail on a road trip across Scotland and Ireland, as he spreads his enthusiasm for Gaelic Psalm singing, and shares songs and ideas with people he meets along the way.

releases.title: Rite To Exorcise
releases.synopsis: A bumbling Priest and his hapless Cameraman are thrust into the world of exorcisms in order to save the soul of a young Girl from an existentially conflicted Demon.

releases.title: Empire of Darkness - The Great History of Cinema
releases.synopsis: From the 1st projection to the newest technology IMAX and 4DX, we will travel trough the history of french theaters, asking questions about technological developments throughout history, and finally, the hoped-for future of movie theaters and how they envision themselves in 20 years.

releases.title: A Coward's Plea
releases.synopsis: Following the accidental death of his brother, a cowardly young knight pleads with the Angel of Death, in the hopes of bringing his brother back.

releases.title: Eddie Romero Remastered: A Century of Filipino Cinema
releases.synopsis: From low budget B movies to films that outlived trends, Eddie Romero did not wait for permission. He worked with what he had, trusted the story, and kept going. Take after take. Decade after decade.  This is not a victory lap. It is a reminder that cinema moves forward because someone dares to try again.

releases.title: Stardom in Kariya 2026 Mar.
releases.synopsis: Stardom in Kariya 2026 Mar. was a professional wrestling event promoted by World Wonder Ring Stardom, held on March 1, 2026 at Kariya City Industrial Promotion Center Aioi Hall in Kariya, Aichi, Japan.

releases.title: The Women Flower Sellers of Grafton Street
releases.synopsis: A representation of the inter-generational connection to selling flowers on Grafton Street.

releases.title: The Tale of the Pathetic Winner
releases.synopsis: Defeat has never been so fascinating when you‚Äôve known victory.

releases.title: Hackquire‚Ñ¢
releases.synopsis:
Hackquire‚Ñ¢ is the field manual for the gray areas of work, built as a workplace Pok√©dex of 100 ‚ÄúHackquees.‚Äù Each follows a Situation, Solution, Action frame with illustrations to decode the unwritten rules of modern work.

Conceived by European writer Etie during an airport delay with other collaborators, Hackquire‚Ñ¢ blends behavioural science, satire, and visual storytelling to explore workplace culture, communication, and creative survival. The project examines the habits, hierarchies, and humour that define modern office life.

Career help needs its Beatles moment at this TikTok turning point, this AI era, and Hackquire‚Ñ¢ aims to be that: readers laugh, share, and act. If Ogilvy on Advertising is the book of ads, Hackquire‚Ñ¢ is the book of modern work.

Trademark registered UK00004015062.

releases.title: Stranger's Death
releases.synopsis:
**An Ordinary Morning, A Silent Change**
On a quiet winter morning in Delhi, a familiar routine breaks. The house feels different. The air feels heavier. What begins as an ordinary day slowly turns into a silent encounter with life, loss, and an unseen truth waiting to be noticed.
**A Stranger Who Was Never Truly Known**
Some people live beside us for years, yet remain strangers. Some endings arrive without warning. Through gentle observation and quiet moments, this story reflects on how easily we overlook the lives moving around us ‚Äî until one absence suddenly becomes louder than any presence.
**A Mother's Wisdom, A Son's Realisation**
Through tender conversations and a mother's simple yet powerful words, the story explores how modern life has changed our idea of living. We run faster, we achieve more, yet breathe less. The past struggled to survive. The present struggles to feel alive.
**Still Breathing**
Stranger's Death is not a story meant to shock. It is meant to awaken. It speaks about forgotten pauses, unnoticed connections, and the fragile truth that we remember how to live only when something reminds us that we are still breathing.
Soft, emotional, and deeply human, this short story invites you to slow down ‚Äî just long enough to see what you may have been missing all along.
Because sometimes, life does not change in loud moments.
It changes in silence.

releases.title: A Constru√ß√£o de Subjetividade Feminina no Romance Pequena Coreografia do Adeus, de Aline Bei
releases.synopsis: Este livro analisa a constru√ß√£o da subjetividade feminina no romance Pequena coreografia do adeus, de Aline Bei, articulando literatura contempor√¢nea e teoria feminista. A partir de autoras como Simone de Beauvoir, Judith Butler, Heleieth Saffioti e Clarissa Pinkola Est√©s, a obra investiga como g√™nero, viol√™ncia, maternidade, abandono e silenciamento atravessam a forma√ß√£o da personagem J√∫lia Terra. A an√°lise destaca a escrita po√©tica e fragment√°ria de Bei como forma de inscri√ß√£o do trauma e da mem√≥ria no corpo do texto. Ao evidenciar a literatura como espa√ßo de resist√™ncia e elabora√ß√£o subjetiva, o estudo contribui para os debates sobre autoria feminina e representa√ß√£o das experi√™ncias das mulheres na contemporaneidade.

releases.title: The Shadows of Nothing

releases.title: Buried in His Heart

releases.title: The White Flower by the Dark Stream
releases.synopsis: A gay romantic novel inspired by true events.

The paper situates Felkin‚Äôs work within the intellectual and social context of Beeston, Nottinghamshire, and traces how these early influences informed later Golden Dawn Tarot structures.

releases.title: My Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Dad
releases.synopsis: This work serves as the primary case study for Sir Jacob Kristopher Anders' research into Digital Provenance and Media Ethics (Ref: Wikidata Q138334536).

releases.title: Apparently, Sir Cameron Needs to Die
releases.synopsis:
In this hilarious, off-the-wall queer fantasy romance, a reclusive sorcerer is forced to protect a cowardly knight after a prophecy ties their fates together.

Funny, touching and inventive, this book is perfect for fans of A Marvellous Light and Dreadful.

All his life, Sir Cameron has tried to stay as far away from danger as possible. But when the Church hands down a prophecy to his fellow knights predicting that the only way to defeat their nemesis, the mad sorcerer Merulo, is to kill Sir Cameron, he finds himself in a situation too sticky for even his considerable wiles. Short of ideas, Cameron throws himself on the mercy of the one person who now actually wants him to the mad sorcerer.

Merulo isn't thrilled to be babysitting a spoilt, attention-seeking knight, but fate has tied them together. And transmogrifying Cameron into a vulture is at least a great source of entertainment. Cameron, meanwhile, is on a voyage of self-discovery. It turns out he's really, really into surly sorcerers who lock him up and tell him what to do. Who knew?

As a legion of knights surround their stronghold, led by an angry concussed elf‚Äîwhich definitely isn't in any way Cameron's fault‚Äîthe sorcerer's poisonous ambitions draw ever closer to fruition. Cameron is quite invested in not dying, but he finds he's also invested in Merulo. And sometimes, supporting the sorcerer you care about means taking an interest in their hobbies. Even if their hobby is trying to kill God.

Even if it might get you killed, too.

releases.title: In the Periphery of It All
You Did Nothing Wrong
releases.synopsis:
Single mother Elodie‚Äôs life has become a fairy tale. She‚Äôs met Bren, equal parts golden-retriever devoted and sinfully handsome. He‚Äôs whisked her and her autistic son, Jude, to the crumbling family house he‚Äôs renovating. She has a new husband, a new house, and a new baby on the way. Everything is perfect.

Then Jude claims he can hear voices in the walls. He says their renovations are ‚Äúhurting‚Äù the house. Even Elodie can‚Äôt ignore it‚Äìsomething strange is going on. The question is, is it with the house, or with her son?

Then the one secret Elodie has been hiding is revealed, and no one is safe anymore.

A pulse-pounding, clever take on the haunted house novel, You Did Nothing Wrong examines the complexities of motherhood and the twisted bonds of family as it races to its shocking ending.

releases.title: We Burned So Bright
releases.synopsis:
Husbands Don and Rodney have lived a good long life. Together they‚Äôve experienced the highest highs of love and family, and lows so low that they felt like the end of the world.

Now, the world is ending for real. A wandering blackhole is coming for Earth and in a month everything and everyone they‚Äôve ever known will be gone.

Suddenly, after 40 years together, Don and Rodney are out of time. They‚Äôre in a race against the clock to make it from Maine to Washington State to take care of some unfinished business before it‚Äôs all over.

On the road they meet those who refuse to believe death is coming and those who rush to meet it. But there are also people living their final days as best they know how‚Äìimpromptu weddings, bright burning bonfires, shared meals, new friends.

And as the blackhole draws near, among ball lightning and under a cracked moon in a kaleidoscope sky, Don and Rodney will look back on their lives and ask if their best was good enough.

Is it enough to burn bright if nothing comes from the ashes?

releases.title: Persona
releases.synopsis:
**A trans woman discovers pornography of herself she has no memory of making, only to find herself led to an unimaginably deeper evil.**

A feral shut-in discovers a disturbing internet porn video of what seems to be herself. A seance of coked-up artists summons unearthly forces in a studio apartment. The staircase of an exurban marketing company descends endlessly beneath the earth. 

In Aoife Josie Clements‚Äô electric, nightmarish, intricately layered novel, the impossibility of goodness crowds in upon two young trans women barely surviving on sex work and zero-hours contracts. Below the familiar evils of capitalism and the bottomless depths of internet culture, a darker horror awaits. What curse follows these women? What are they escaping? What are they running towards?

releases.title: Nell O'Dell Hates Quests
releases.synopsis:
**What happens when the quest finds you, despite your best efforts? A reluctant adventurer sets off on an unexpected journey in this broadly appealing fantasy at once earnest and self-aware, funny and heartfelt, and thoroughly charming.**

Nell O‚ÄôDell yearns for a quiet life tending her garden and caring for her chickens. Unfortunately, her family runs the bustling Crossroads Inn‚Äîaccommodating all species of patron from fairies to fauns to half-giants, most of them questers on their way to seek glory and fortune. What‚Äôs more, her parents are retired questers themselves, and everyone assumes that Nell will follow in their footsteps. Then the day comes when a letter arrives from the government, threatening the Inn and all that Nell holds dear, and someone needs to go on a short journey to the capital to take care of it. Nell is the only one available‚Äîbut that's fine, because it's just a boring business trip, not a quest! Even if she does find herself up against an excitable travel partner, a thief in the night, a stolen treasure, and a mysterious knife . . . Lively black-and-white illustrations by the author embellish this breezy, bighearted adventure that will satisfy both longtime questers and first-time visitors to the genre.

releases.title: Exalta
releases.synopsis:
The city doesn‚Äôt kill you. It processes you.

In the fog-choked Sprawl beneath the corporate tower called Exalta, the Runner survives by staying uncounted. He carries packages he doesn‚Äôt open, follows routes he doesn‚Äôt question, and renews his identity in shrinking access windows. His existence is a suffix on a form. When the suffix expires, so does he.

Liam Kestrel is a Security & Containment Commander inside Exalta‚Äôs administrative core. He enforces compliance, signs disposal orders, and tells himself the system works because it has to. Then a routine surveillance report crosses his desk: an unidentified subject, still breathing, who should have been processed weeks ago. Liam should file the report. He should let the system close the case.
He doesn‚Äôt.

As the Runner‚Äôs windows slam shut and Liam‚Äôs quiet mutiny draws the attention of the people who erase problems rather than solve them, their paths converge on a room where the corporation will demonstrate exactly how it maintains order. There are no firing squads. No gulags. Just paperwork, and the clean silence after it‚Äôs filed.

*For readers of Never Let Me Go and Kafka. A dystopian nightmare where the most terrifying sentence is: ‚ÄúYour request has been processed.‚Äù*

releases.title: Shady
releases.synopsis:
In a world ruled by greed, betrayal, and secrets, Giselle Whitfield has always danced on the razor‚Äôs edge between elegance and destruction. It all started with Ms. Greta Mitchell, her jealous-hearted mother, who abandoned her at a young age only to barge back in and unleash hell.

To survive, Giselle mastered the art of deception, wearing resilience like couture and secrets like perfume. Now, fifteen years after the storm first hit shelves, her story is remixed with bonus content and deleted scenes that peel back even more layers of her shady, shattered truth.

Will Giselle‚Äôs Prince Charming and his red carpet promises finally light the way through her shadowed past? Or will the lies she buried come blazing back with consequences she can‚Äôt outrun?

Dell Banks‚Äô debut novel Shady ignited the streets of Detroit and this Anniversary Edition brings that fire back stronger, deeper, and unapologetically raw.

releases.title: Transition Age
releases.synopsis: The Transition Age did not begin quietly. It was declared, ratified, and widely supported in the aftermath of global collapse.

releases.title: ADHOORI AARZOO
releases.synopsis:
**ADHOORI AARZOO** is a heartfelt romantic novel about love, destiny, and the pain of unfulfilled dreams.
**When Nandan crosses paths with Heer,** what begins as an ordinary meeting slowly turns into an unforgettable connection. In stolen glances and silent conversations, their bond grows deeper than words. But love does not always follow the heart. Circumstances change, timing fails them, and fate tests their relationship in ways they never expected.
Tender, emotional, and hauntingly real.
**ADHOORI AARZOO** is a story of a love that remains incomplete‚Äîyet eternal. It explores the beauty of falling in love and the ache of letting go, reminding us that some connections stay with us forever, even if they were never meant to last.

**Will love find its way back, or will it remain just an incomplete desire?**

releases.title: Unraveling
releases.synopsis:
Therapist Lily Weber isn't one to wallow in the past, but her formative years left her with a thirst for justice and a flexible code of ethics. Lily spent years reinventing herself, changing her name to leave behind her tumultuous childhood and fractured relationship with her mother. But beneath her carefully curated life lies a simmering obsession: to dismantle Hugh Randall's life by any means necessary. Hugh, the famous film producer who upended her life when she was fifteen, is still powerful, privileged, and untouchable. Or, is he?

When a side gig offers Lily access to Hollywood's power players, she weaves a web of traps and landmines, creating cracks in the foundation of Hugh's life and the company he's spent decades building. But as her methods grow riskier, her plan begins to unravel. With her career and future on the line, Lily must confront how far she's willing to go for justice, and whether she's willing to risk every relationship in her life.

Unraveling alternates between Lily's present-day schemes and the pivotal summer on Nantucket when, as a lonely teen named Morgan, she was first captivated by both Hugh and his charming wife, Elena-- a relationship that left scars she can no longer ignore.

releases.title: Basil Khan and The Secret of the Heritage Clock
releases.synopsis:
Basil Khan loves mysteries‚Äîespecially the kind that hide in plain sight. He just never expected to be living inside one.

When a beloved master clockmaker dies and leaves behind a will that doesn‚Äôt feel right, sixteen-year-old Basil senses something is wrong. The entire estate is handed to a powerful family, while the people who truly cared for the old man are left with nothing. Everyone else accepts it. Basil doesn‚Äôt.

Guided by curiosity, logic, and a sharp technical mind, Basil begins searching for clues no one else notices. What starts as a quiet investigation soon becomes a race against time‚Äîfilled with hidden patterns, mechanical puzzles, unexpected dangers, and truths buried beneath silence.

As Basil digs deeper, he discovers that the key to the mystery may be connected to an extraordinary object: an old clock designed to hold more than just time. Each discovery brings him closer to the truth‚Äîand closer to real consequences. To succeed, Basil must rely on patience, critical thinking, and the courage to stand up for what is right, even when the odds are against him.

Basil Khan and the Secret of the Heritage Clock is a smart, fast-paced mystery that blends classic detective storytelling with modern problem-solving. It celebrates curiosity, ethical choices, and the power of thinking differently‚Äîshowing how one determined mind can make a meaningful difference in an entire community.

Perfect for readers who enjoy puzzles, suspense, and mysteries where intelligence matters as much as bravery.

releases.title: This House Will Feed
releases.synopsis:
Amidst the devastation of Ireland‚Äôs Great Famine, a young woman is salvaged from certain death when offered a mysterious position at a remote manor house haunted by a strange power and the horror of her own memories in this chillingly evocative historical novel braided with gothic horror and supernatural suspense for readers of Katherine Arden‚Äôs The Warm Hands of Ghosts and The Silence Factory by Bridget Collins.

County Clare, 1848: In the scant few years since the potato blight first cast its foul shadow over Ireland, Maggie O‚ÄôShaughnessy has lost everything‚Äîher entire family and the man she trusted with her heart. Toiling in the Ennis Workhouse for paltry rations, she can see no future either within or outside its walls‚Äîuntil the mysterious Lady Catherine arrives to whisk her away to an old mansion in the stark limestone landscape of the Burren.

Lady Catherine wants Maggie to impersonate her late daughter, Wilhelmina, and hoodwink solicitors into releasing Wilhelmina‚Äôs widow pension so that Lady Catherine can continue to provide for the villagers in her care. In exchange, Maggie will receive freedom from the workhouse, land of her own, and the one thing she wants more than a chance to fulfill the promise she made to her brother on his deathbed‚Äîto live to spite them all.

Launching herself into the daunting task, Maggie plays the role of Wilhelmina as best she can while ignoring the villagers‚Äô tales of ghostly figures and curses. But more worrying are the whispers that come from within. Something in Lady Catherine‚Äôs house is reawakening long-buried memories in Maggie‚Äîof a foe more terrifying than hunger or greed, of a power that calls for blood and vengeance, and of her own role in a nightmare that demands the darkest sacrifice . . .

releases.title: Querida Debbie
releases.synopsis:
Sometimes, enough is enough‚Ä¶

Debbie Mullen is losing it. For years, she has compiled all of her best advice into her column, Dear Debbie, where the wives of New England come for sympathy and neighborly advice. Through her work, Debbie has heard from countless women who are ignored, belittled, or even abused by their husbands. And Debbie does her best to guide them in the right direction. Or at least, she did.

These days, Debbie‚Äôs life seems to be spiraling out of control. She just lost her job. Something strange is happening with her teenage daughters. And her husband is keeping secrets, according to the tracking app she installed on his phone. Now, Debbie‚Äôs done being the bigger person.

She‚Äôs done being reasonable and practical. It‚Äôs time to take her own advice.

And now it‚Äôs time for payback against all the people in her life who deserve it the most.

releases.title: Deadman's Pool
releases.synopsis:
A SACRED ISLAND

Winter storms lash the Isles of Scilly, when DI Ben Kitto ferries the islands‚Äô priest to St Helen‚Äôs. Father Michael intends to live as a pilgrim in the ruins of an ancient church on the uninhabited island, but an ugly secret is buried among the rocks. Digging frantically in the sand, Ben‚Äôs dog, Shadow, unearths the emaciated remains of a young woman.

A SHOCKING MURDER

The discovery chills Ben to the core. The victim is Vietnamese, with no clear link to the community ‚Äì and her killer has made sure that no one will find her easily.

A KILLER ON THE LOOSE

The storm intensifies as the investigation gathers pace. Soon Scilly is cut off by bad weather, with no help available from the mainland. Ben is certain the killer is hiding in plain sight. He knows they are waiting to kill again ‚Äì and at unimaginable cost.

releases.title: Lost in Transit
releases.synopsis:
Jerry thought a simple delivery contract was his ticket to a new life. He didn't expect a spider-legged navigator, a "Class ZZ" package that no one is allowed to touch, or a best friend who‚Äôs about to become more machine than man.

Guided by an eternal watcher known only as Galaxy, Jerry‚Äôs story is a reminder that the universe is a weird, dangerous, and beautiful place‚Äîespecially when you‚Äôre flying a ship held together by hope and high-fructose corn syrup.

releases.title: Valentine's Day Activity Book
releases.synopsis: Handpicked by me, a collection of Valentine‚Äôs Day puzzles.

releases.title: When I Kill You
releases.synopsis:
*Who is watching Nell Masters?*

Nell Masters is certain someone is following her. The hairs on the back of her neck rise when she travels to and from work, there are silent calls to her office, and a huge bouquet of flowers arrives without a card. And Nell has a reason to be looking over her shoulder, because she has a secret that she‚Äôs hiding from everyone in her life, including her new partner, Alex. But Alex also has secrets of his own.

Fourteen years earlier, when Nell went by the name Elle Nugent, she witnessed a student, Bryony Sanders, getting into a stranger‚Äôs car. When Bryony was found murdered, Elle became obsessed with finding the person responsible. She was convinced she knew who it was and her fixation with Brett Parker, the man she accused, led her down a dangerous path . . .

Now, Nell tries to convince herself that this unnerving feeling of being watched is all in her mind. Has someone from her past discovered her new identity? Has the stalker become the stalked? Or is there something even more deadly at play?

releases.title: My Husbands Wife
releases.synopsis:
Eden Fox, an artist on the brink of her big break, sets off for a run before her first exhibition. When she returns to the home she recently moved into, Spyglass, an enchanting old house in Hope Falls, nothing is as it should be. Her key doesn‚Äôt fit. A woman, eerily similar to her, answers the door. And her husband insists that the stranger is his wife.

One house. One husband. Two women. Someone is lying.

Six months earlier, a reclusive Londoner called Birdy, reeling from a life-changing diagnosis, inherits Spyglass. This unexpected gift from a long-lost grandmother brings her to the pretty seaside village of Hope Falls. But then Birdy stumbles upon a shadowy London clinic that claims to be able to predict a person's date of death, including her own. Secrets start to unravel, and as the line between truth and lies blurs, Birdy feels compelled to right some old wrongs.

releases.title: A Hole in the Sky
releases.synopsis: It was a Cycling Day - my Cycling Day, actually.

releases.title: Nameless
releases.synopsis:
It was supposed to be a nothing job.

Identify a body that‚Äôd been reduced to its component elements by a swarm of nanites, get a paycheck. Satya Hassan didn‚Äôt have to like the cops to like paying rent, and with more than half of the country out of work, well, a gig is a gig. Only now, she and Dan Landvik, a detective just promoted to homicide, are trapped on all sides amoral megacorps, an uncaring government, and a mass-murderer that the Minneapolis Police Department doesn‚Äôt dare to touch.

Betrayed by the people they thought they could rely on, facing an enemy they can‚Äôt pin down, and without even the name of a victim to go on, Dan and Satya will have to do more than uncover a conspiracy‚Äîthey‚Äôll have to face their own lifetimes of queer trauma, make allies out of enemies, and maybe even change the world along the way.

releases.title: Still Lost
releases.synopsis:
"Still Lost" is the estranged brainchild of Sam O'Nella Academy creator Sam A. Miller.

A whopping eight rather long short stories are included, featuring such concepts as:

    An alien prostitute
    A baboon that gets cyberbullied
    An old lady getting killed with a sword
    An eight page discussion about grass

And many more!

releases.title: Between Harmony and Fire
releases.synopsis: Between Harmony and Fire is a collection of six standalone mythic fantasy stories set in the world of Akidir. The stories explore themes of balance, divinity, and the aftermath of a fallen golden age. This book can be read independently.

releases.title: Through the Looking-Glass, and What Alice Found There
releases.synopsis: One thing was certain, that the white kitten had had nothing to do with it:‚Äîit was the black kitten‚Äôs fault entirely.

releases.title: Twelve Months
releases.synopsis:
Harry Dresden, Chicago‚Äôs only professional wizard, has always managed to save the day‚Äîbut, in this powerful entry in the #1 New York Times bestselling Dresden Files, can he save himself?

One year. 365 days. Twelve months.

Harry Dresden has been through a lot, and so has his city. After Harry and his allies narrowly managed to save Chicago from being razed to the ground, everything is different‚Äîand it‚Äôs not just the current lack of electricity.

In the battle, Harry lost people he cared about. And that's the kind of loss that takes a toll. Harry being Harry, he‚Äôs doing his level best to help the city and his friends recover and rebuild. But it‚Äôs a heavy load, and he needs time.

But time is one thing Harry doesn‚Äôt have. Ghouls are prowling Chicago and taking out innocent civilians. Harry‚Äôs brother is dying, and Harry doesn‚Äôt know how to help him. And last but certainly not least, the Winter Queen of the Fae has allied with the White Court of vampires‚Äîand Harry‚Äôs been betrothed to the seductive, deadly vampire Lara Raith to seal the deal.

It's been a tough year. More than ever, the city needs Harry Dresden the wizard‚Äîbut after loss and grief, is there enough left of Harry Dresden the man to rise to the challenge?

releases.title: Ronald, the Ronin
releases.synopsis:
**One year ago, Ronald and his brother Jiro entered a magical portal to complete their final trial and join the secret samurai society, the Order of the Golden Bonsai. Only Ronald returned.**

Now a far from ordinary high school student, Ronald turns to hip-hop and music production in a desperate attempt to forget what he experienced, whilst his father relies on alcohol. At first, this seems to work for Ronald, and he spends his days contending with bullies, navigating relationships and even managing to attract the attention of his crush.

However, when his father destroys his computer in a drunken fit of rage, this all changes. Ronald‚Äôs main source of comfort and distraction is ripped away from him, and his mental health begins to unravel. Then, an assassin, sent by the Order, arrives at his house.

Ronald cannot outrun his past, and he‚Äôs forced to confront a world he‚Äôs spent the last year trying to forget. All he can do is try to finish what he and Jiro started. Can he bring vengeance to the woman who killed his brother and restore honor to the family name? Or will Ronald be destroyed by the world that‚Äôs already stolen everything from him?

releases.title: Estro Junkies
releases.synopsis:
Nicky‚Äôs never getting on oestrogen. She‚Äôs too late. The waiting lists are years long, and private clinics are shutting down. She‚Äôs rotting in the apartment she shares with her childhood friend Daniel, the insufferable twink Jeff, and Kyle with his helicopter mother and arranged marriage‚Äîand there‚Äôs no way out.

Until Daniel knocks on her door with news of an underground online contest. It awards hormones and surgeries to anyone willing to grow the biggest breasts‚Äîso long as they claim they‚Äôre cis men, and no fellow competitor can prove otherwise. The prize for these men? A million dollars. For Nicky? Her salvation.

Except not all‚Äôs as it seems. Daniel is actually Katherine, a trans woman terrified to come out‚Äîwhat if she loses her oldest and only friend? Jeff, hopelessly enamoured with Kyle, turned to the contest to make himself more attractive. And for Kyle, only a million-dollar victory could unshackle him from the life of an eldest desi son.

As their lies and desires set the roommates on a collision course, the question remains: what kind of man would compete to take oestrogen? Answer carefully. Online, someone is always watching. Sisters of Dorley meets Stag Dance in this absurdist, satirical drama exploring transfeminine love, community, and identity in times of panic, scarcity, and crackdown.

releases.title: Evening the Score
releases.synopsis:
A grudge hates to see Olivia Hinckley coming. Years ago, a dirty hit ended her late father‚Äôs NHL career with the Minnesota Freeze. It was never fair that Erik Parker walked away with little more than a penalty, but it‚Äôs worse that her father's rival is now up for Hall of Fame induction. On top of that, Erik's son‚Äîhockey‚Äôs golden boy, Brody‚Äîjust signed on to play for the Freeze. Determined to dismantle the Parker legacy, Olivia enacts a revenge plot that has her donning the Freeze‚Äôs mascot costume to gain intel on the Parkers. And she can‚Äôt help but mess with Brody‚Äôs gameplay‚Äîand his heart for good measure. After all, what‚Äôs a little fake dating between enemies?

Brody Parker only ever wanted to play hockey for fun, but the pressure of being part of hockey‚Äôs ‚ÄúFirst Family‚Äù has him dodging nepotism allegations along with high sticks. Erik might act like Father of the Year when the cameras are on, but behind closed doors, Brody struggles with his father‚Äôs impossible expectations. Preserving Erik‚Äôs image is a full-time job, but lucky for Brody, his new connection with Olivia is a welcome (spicy) distraction.

When Brody finally opens up to Olivia, she never expected she‚Äôd pity a Parker for anything. Suddenly, she wants to protect her once-enemy. The romantic feelings she faked are now unexpectedly real, but after leading Brody on for so long, can she keep the lies and the truth straight before she accidentally blows up his whole life?

releases.title: Lustful Lives  2
releases.synopsis: In this e-book series,I have described about My Mom's Romantic Life spent with our Uncle's home at a Night. I also translated into Multiple Asian and European Languages in this book.

releases.title: Emma
releases.synopsis: Emma Woodhouse, handsome, clever, and rich, with a comfortable home and happy disposition, seemed to unite some of the best blessings of existence; and had lived nearly twenty-one years in the world with very little to distress or vex her.

releases.title: Sick Punt
releases.synopsis:
**Their love language? He bleeds on her shards while she gets high on his nectar‚Ä¶**

Leera, the living doll, has a blood soaked heart. She wants her idol, Enzo‚Äôs approval. But he continues to use her for his selfish gain, just to make her squirm. She‚Äôs willing to endure his sadistic humiliation and terror, not knowing what will be left of her when he‚Äôs done.

*Leera
Betchu couldn‚Äôt go a day without tryna give me some sort of redirection. Your ego is swole‚Äô. 
Enzo
Aw, that‚Äôs cute. I bet you won‚Äôt go a week without needing my approval,*

releases.title: Agnes Aubert's Mystical Cat Shelter
releases.synopsis:
**A woman who runs a cat rescue in 1920s Montreal turns to a grouchy but charming wizard to help save the shelter in this heartwarming cozy fantasy from the *New York Times* bestselling author of the Emily Wilde series.**

Agnes Aubert leads a meticulously organized life‚Äîand she likes it that way. As the proudly type-A manager of a much-needed cat rescue charity, she has devoted her life to finding forever homes for lost cats.

But after she is forced to move the cat shelter, Agnes learns that her new landlord is using her charity as a front‚Äîfor an internationally renowned and thoroughly disreputable magic shop. Owned by the disorganized‚Äînot to mention self-absorbed, irritating, but also decidedly handsome‚ÄîHavelock Renard, magician and failed Dark Lord, the shop draws magical clientele from around the world, partly due to the quality of Havelock‚Äôs illicit goods as well as their curiosity about his shadowy past and rumors of his incredible powers. Agnes's charity offers the perfect cover for illegal magics.

Agnes couldn‚Äôt care less about the shop‚Äîmagical intrigue or not, there are cats to be rescued. But when an enemy from Havelock‚Äôs past surfaces, the magic shop‚Äîand more importantly, the cat shelter‚Äîare suddenly in jeopardy. To save the shelter, will Agnes have to set aside her social conscience and protect the man who once tried to bring about the apocalypse‚Äîand is now trying to steal her heart?

releases.title: First Freedom
releases.synopsis:
Born in 1926, Opal Lee grew up in a racially divided America and dedicated her life to overcoming the obstacles presented therein. A lifelong educator, Ms. Opal has been a community activist all her life, and would take on the movement to celebrate and commemorate Juneteenth not just as a holiday, but as a symbol of comprehensive freedom for all people.

Ms. Opal‚Äôs life personifies the fight for everyday freedom that leads to lasting change. As the Grandmother of Juneteenth says, ‚ÄúThere is so much more to do.‚Äù

releases.title: From Partition to Pioneer - Pakistan's medical pioneer biography book
releases.synopsis:
From Partition to Pioneer is a Pakistani medical pioneer biography book that tells the inspiring story of Professor Dr. Bashir Ahmad (1934‚Äì2014), the visionary who laid the foundations of neurosurgery in Pakistan. Trained in England, he returned to Lahore to advance modern medicine, build healthcare institutions, and mentor generations of surgeons, blending precision, purpose, and dedication to service.

This authoritative biography of Dr. Bashir Ahmad draws on family memories, rare archives, and eyewitness accounts to showcase the legacy of a neurosurgery pioneer. His journey through Partition, professional challenges, and groundbreaking achievements highlights the evolution of healthcare development in Pakistan, shaping medical education, hospital systems, and patient care.

A story of courage, innovation, resilience, and leadership, From Partition to Pioneer is a must-read for anyone interested in medical history, Pakistan‚Äôs healthcare transformation, pioneering doctors, and the extraordinary life of one of the nation‚Äôs most influential medical figures.

releases.title: Titanium, The Life & Memoirs Of Toby Ti Mustard
releases.synopsis: Titanium: Life of X is a raw, visionary memoir by ordained minister and creative leader Toby Ti Mustard. This spiritual autobiography traces a journey of awakening, reincarnation, and resilience ‚Äî a life forged in silence, shaped by struggle, and elevated by purpose. Set against the backdrop of Ross County, Ohio, Toby‚Äôs story unfolds through mystical insight, personal transformation, and a calling to serve. Titanium is not just a book ‚Äî it‚Äôs a declaration of identity, a spiritual blueprint, and a testament to the unbreakable force of becoming.

releases.title: Intoxicated Ways of Knowing
releases.synopsis:
Intoxicating substances can be found lurking in every corner of modern life, and Matthew Perkins-McVey‚Äôs pathbreaking book offers the untold story of how they were implicated in shifting perceptions of embodiment found in the emerging sciences of the body and mind in late-nineteenth-century Germany. Their use in this experimental context gave rise to a dynamic conception of the subject within the scientific, psychological, philosophical, and sociological milieu of the era. The history of the modern biological subject, Perkins-McVey argues, turns on ‚Äúintoxicated ways of knowing.‚Äù
 
Intoxicated Ways of Knowing identifies the state of intoxication as a tacit form of thinking and knowing with the body. Intoxicants force us to feel, intervening directly in our perceptional awareness, and, Perkins-McVey contends, they bring latent conceptual associations into the foreground of conscious thought, engendering new ways of knowing the world. The book unfurls how intoxicants affected nineteenth-century German science and how, ultimately, the connection between mental life and intoxication is taken up in the works of Friedrich Nietzsche, Max Weber, and Sigmund Freud, bringing the biological subject out of the lab and into the worlds of philosophy, psychoanalysis, sociology, and politics.

releases.title: Of Bloodlines and Blue Notes
releases.synopsis: Of Bloodlines and Blue Notes is a hybrid work of music writing and cultural criticism that brings together lyrics, album notes, and critical essays rooted in Black American music as lived practice. Written in conversation with three connected albums, it treats songs as evidence of inheritance shaped by history, labor, survival, and family memory. Blade writes from inside the tradition, reflecting on lineage, the ethics of listening, and what it means to carry the blues forward in the present.

releases.title: To Catch a Fascist
releases.synopsis:
A searing, provocative investigation into the rise of white nationalist and neo-Nazi movements in the United States, centered on the anti-fascist groups working to expose and stop these hateful factions.

Demonized as ‚Äúextremist‚Äù by conservatives and liberals alike, ‚Äúantifa‚Äù became a bogeyman during Donald Trump‚Äôs first term. But few Americans understood the dangerous work antifa was doing to disrupt and unmask a new generation of white supremacists or listened when antifa sounded the alarm about these white supremacists taking positions of power. Now this underground network of militant anti-fascists is determined to stop the rising tide of fascism in America. No matter the cost.

In the tradition of in-the-room investigative classics such as The Smartest Guys in the Room and Bad Blood, To Catch a Fascist follows different factions of antifascists as they work to unmask hateful extremists before they commit devastating acts of violence. With searing detail and exclusive reporting, To Catch a Fascist paints a vivid picture of the stakes in this ongoing, often unseen war between opposite ends of the political spectrum, highlighting the scrappy resourcefulness and resilience of anti-fascist movements against their increasingly violent adversaries. Utilizing razor-sharp storytelling and eye-opening insight, this timely and necessary book reveals the human cost, moral dilemmas, and unwavering determination involved in fighting white supremacy.

Both a call to action and a pulse-raising look at the powerful work being done to combat today‚Äôs gravest threat to democracy, To Catch a Fascist will inspire you to fight for your community.

releases.title: Middlemarch, A Study of Provincial Life
releases.synopsis: Who that cares much to know the history of man, and how the mysterious mixture behaves under the varying experiments of Time, has not dwelt, at least briefly, on the life of Saint Theresa, has not smiled with some gentleness at the thought of the little girl walking forth one morning hand-in-hand with her still smaller brother, to go and seek martyrdom in the country of the Moors?

releases.title: A Modest Proposal
releases.synopsis: It is a melancholy object to those, who walk through this great town, or travel in the country, when they see the streets, the roads, and cabbin-doors crowded with beggars of the female sex, followed by three, four, or six children, all in rags, and importuning every passenger for an alms."

releases.title: Neither a Just War Nor Just a War | A Realistic Soldier Novel
releases.synopsis:
Neither a Just War Nor Just a War by Khalid Mehmood is a compelling soldier novel that immerses readers into the brutal and emotionally charged world of modern conflict. Blending realism with fiction, this war history novel stands out as a gripping fiction book about Iraq, capturing the devastation, chaos, and irreversible losses caused by war.

This emotional war novel follows Hastings, a young American soldier torn between his duty and his conscience as he enters Iraq with his battalion. Amid destruction, guilt, and fear, he learns that war is never heroic, it's a harsh battle for survival. With his loyal friend Harbash at his side, Hastings faces the torment of killing, being hunted, and watching hope disappear day by day. When tragedy unfolds during their final mission, a heartfelt letter reveals the true cost of conflict and the depth of human suffering.

The way Khalid Mehmood portrays the pain of the Iraqi people during war and the heavy burden carried by soldiers torn between duty and humanity makes this the best war novel, offering a real depiction of war‚Äôs destruction and deep human suffering.

releases.title: Les Incas
releases.synopsis: In Les Incas, M√©traux provides a comprehensive analysis of the Inca Empire as the most advanced civilization of the pre-Columbian Andes. Using ethnohistorical sources, colonial chronicles, and archaeological findings, he reconstructs the political administration, ayllu-based social organization, redistributive economy, and ritual practices of the empire. The work explores Inca cosmology, royal ideology, and imperial governance within a broader anthropological framework. By integrating historical documentation with cultural analysis, M√©traux contributes significantly to the scholarly understanding of indigenous South American societies and the structural foundations of Andean civilization.

releases.title: Keys of Agriculture-Public Service Commission Book for Exams
releases.synopsis: Keys of Agriculture is a comprehensive Public Service Commission book designed to support students and young professionals preparing for competitive examinations across the broad domain of agricultural and allied sciences. This exam-oriented compendium covers twelve major disciplines, including Agricultural Extension, Agronomy, Biotechnology, Veterinary Sciences, Food Science, Horticulture, Plant Breeding, Plant Pathology, Human Nutrition, and more.

Resumo
Este artigo prop√µe uma reflex√£o cr√≠tica sobre a famosa met√°fora do ‚Äúcisne negro‚Äù de Karl Popper, amplamente utilizada para ilustrar o princ√≠pio da falsificabilidade cient√≠fica. A partir de uma an√°lise biol√≥gica e taxon√¥mica, o texto argumenta que a met√°fora se apoia em uma indu√ß√£o disfar√ßada e em uma defini√ß√£o imprecisa do termo ‚Äúcisne‚Äù. O cisne-negro (Cygnus atratus) e o cisne-branco (Cygnus olor) pertencem a esp√©cies distintas, o que compromete a validade da refuta√ß√£o proposta por Popper. A cr√≠tica se estende a outros exemplos zool√≥gicos ‚Äî como gar√ßas, papagaios, maritacas, araras, gatos e c√£es ‚Äî para mostrar como nomes populares podem agrupar esp√©cies diferentes sob uma mesma designa√ß√£o, gerando confus√µes conceituais. O artigo conclui que a for√ßa de uma refuta√ß√£o cient√≠fica depende da clareza dos termos utilizados, e que met√°foras mal formuladas podem fragilizar o m√©todo cient√≠fico ao confundir ajustes de linguagem com descobertas emp√≠ricas.

Palavras chaves: Filosofia da ci√™ncia, Falsificabilidade, Indu√ß√£o, Met√°foras cient√≠ficas, Taxonomia, Cisne negro, Karl Popper, Linguagem cient√≠fica, Esp√©cies biol√≥gicas, Precis√£o conceitual.

Abstract (em ingl√™s)
This article presents a critical reflection on Karl Popper‚Äôs famous ‚Äúblack swan‚Äù metaphor, widely used to illustrate the principle of scientific falsifiability. Through a biological and taxonomic analysis, it argues that the metaphor relies on disguised induction and an imprecise definition of the term ‚Äúswan.‚Äù The black swan (Cygnus atratus) and the white swan (Cygnus olor) belong to distinct species, which undermines the validity of Popper‚Äôs proposed refutation. The critique extends to other zoological examples ‚Äî such as herons, parrots, parakeets, macaws, cats, and dogs ‚Äî to demonstrate how popular names often group different species under a single label, leading to conceptual confusion. The article concludes that the strength of scientific refutation depends on the precision of the terms used, and that poorly formulated metaphors can weaken scientific reasoning by conflating linguistic adjustments with empirical discoveries.
Keywords: Philosophy of science, Falsifiability, Induction, Scientific metaphors, Taxonomy, Black swan, Karl Popper, Scientific language, Biological species, Conceptual precision.

releases.title: The Generative Revolution
releases.synopsis:
The Generative Revolution provides a concise yet powerful exploration of how Generative
AI is transforming creativity, innovation, and human‚Äìmachine interaction. Integrating
insights from multiple disciplines, the volume examines core architectures, multimodal
systems, and diverse applications across science, engineering, healthcare, and the arts. It
also addresses key ethical and societal challenges while offering practical guidance for
researchers, educators, technologists, and policymakers. This book serves as a timely
roadmap to understanding the future of intelligent creativity and innovation.

metadata.publisher: THE INSTITUTE FOR INNOVATIONS IN ENGINEERING AND TECHNOLOGY

releases.title: Fabulous Bodies
releases.synopsis:
Fashion influencer by day and grave-robber by night, Poppy Stringer is on call when Eddie Michaels‚Äîa flamboyant, piano-slamming rockstar and queer icon‚Äîunexpectedly dies. All Poppy has to do is retrieve Eddie‚Äôs body from the medical examiner‚Äôs office, but what starts as a routine delivery quickly goes off course when Eddie wakes up.

Poppy must fight for her life in a blood-soaked night of carnage and fabulous entertainment all across Palm Springs.

releases.title: The Regicide Report
releases.synopsis:
An occult assassin, an elderly royal and a living god face off in The Regicide Report, the thrilling final novel in Charles Stross' epic, Hugo Award-winning Laundry Files series.

When the Elder God recently installed as Prime Minister identifies the monarchy as a threat to his growing power, Bob Howard and Mo O'Brien - recently of the supernatural espionage service known as the Laundry Files - are reluctantly pressed into service.

Fighting vampirism, scheming American agents and their own better instincts, Bob and Mo will join their allies for the very last time. God save the Queen‚Äï because someone has to.

releases.title: Occulta Daemonia
releases.synopsis:
Five friends escape to a remote mountain resort for a weekend away from real life. The hike is planned, the rooms are booked, and the nights promise nothing more dangerous than drinks, laughter, and old memories.

Until they borrow a strange board game from the reception.

The rules are simple.
The candle must stay lit.
Questions must concern the future.
And every Favor must be paid.

What begins as a harmless distraction soon twists into something they cannot walk away from. The mountain grows colder. The forest grows silent. And one by one, the group discovers the price of asking the wrong question.

By morning, only one will remember.
And he will wish he didn‚Äôt.

Some games demand more than luck.
Some favors cannot be returned.

releases.title: Gush
releases.synopsis:
**What should have been lust became something hotter, thicker, and clotting.**

Naked and exposed, the girls press closer, bodies slick with want, breaths mixing in a shared rhythm. But the timid one drops to her knees, onto all fours, baring her secrets. She starts to bleed, spilling faster than it should. It deepens, it darkens, it spews with violence. But what the bleeding doesn‚Äôt do, is stop.

*A sapphic, erotic horror story.*

releases.title: Feral Bloom
releases.synopsis: Logs collapsed in the grate and the darker lumps hissed.

releases.title: Shah Jahan - Fantasy Drama Book
releases.synopsis:
Shah Jahan by Usman Ali Shah Jahan is a thoughtful fantasy drama book that brings together emotion, depth, and human experience in a way that feels both real and timeless. It invites readers to see the world through the eyes of characters who search for meaning, truth, and kindness in the face of hardship. 

The story unfolds with calm intensity, showing how people live, love, and survive in moments of struggle and silence. Each scene feels natural and alive, written with care and purpose, reflecting the light and shadows of human nature. The author captures both the cruelty of power and the quiet strength of hope, allowing the reader to see how art can express what words often cannot. Shah Jahan is more than a modern drama book; it is an honest portrayal of what it means to be human, to feel pain, and still choose compassion. 

The writing is simple yet powerful, offering reflections that stay long after the book is closed. Readers who enjoy drama novels books and contemporary fiction books will find in it a voice that speaks to shared experiences and emotions. It is a story that values truth over show, meaning over noise, and hope over despair. Shah Jahan stands as a reminder that even in the hardest times, art can heal, stories can connect us, and humanity continues to seek understanding.

releases.synopsis: A story about two siblings, a brother and sister known as The Vane, who are ruthless, greedy, and selfish, forming an evil duo. With an unquenchable thirst for the throne, they will stop at nothing to get it, no matter who they hurt along the way.

releases.title: Tool Land

releases.title: Idlemon

releases.title: Mixatro

releases.title: Honor Mice

releases.title: Saccharine Echo
releases.synopsis: Saccharine Echo is a story that walks the line between psychological drama and dark paranormal romance. Your choices will shape the fate of a young woman haunted by an obsessive entity from another world.

releases.title: One Tower Defense
releases.synopsis: One Tower Defense is a Roguelike Tower Defense game where you control a single tower. Gather resources, buy weapons and upgrades, and fight endless waves of enemies. Play in single-player mode or in multiplayer mode, where the last survivor wins.

releases.title: Grand Valor
releases.synopsis: Grand Valor is a fast-paced fantasy action platformer featuring a tiny knight on a daring quest, blending swift movement and intense combat as you navigate challenging levels and defeat enemies with agility and skill.

releases.title: Gnomed

releases.title: Tow the Line
releases.synopsis: Chained together meets tow trucks in this challenging platformer. Play solo or co-op!

releases.title: Tomica to Tom (TV)
releases.synopsis:
After you fall asleep or while you're out, what are Tomica and Tom doing? Are they sleeping peacefully in the toy box? Are they just sitting there on the floor? Or maybe... No one knows the story of Tomica and Tom, but today we'll let you in on a special secret.

(Source: Official site, translated)

releases.title: Sai-Kyo-Oh! Zukan: The Ultimate Tournament
releases.synopsis: Second season of Sai-Kyo-Oh! Zukan: The Ultimate Battles.

releases.title: Manul no Yuube
releases.synopsis: Within the nature "Darwin Kita! Kikimono Shin Densetsu" program on NHK1.5 airs the short Manul no Yuube, based on a web manga/comic of the same name. It following animal characters who visit the bar Manul no Yuube. The bar is run by the Mama who is a Pallas's cat (Otocolobus manul) and serviced by the hostess Tsunomin who is a Brazilian treehopper (Bocydium globulare).

releases.title: Himitsu no AiPri: Ring-hen
releases.synopsis: Second season of Himitsu no AiPri.

releases.title: Meitantei Precure!
releases.synopsis:
Anna Akechi is a second-year junior high student living in Makoto Mirai Town. On her 14th birthday, she has a chance encounter with a fairy named Pochitan, and a magical pendant caused her to travel back in time from 2027 to 1999! In the Makoto Mirai Town 28 years in the past, Anna meets Mikuru Kobayashi, a girl her age who wants to become a great detective.

Meanwhile, people in town are in trouble as their prized possessions are being stolen from under their noses - the cause being a group of Phantom Thieves. To stop them, Anna and Mikuru turn into Precures! Maybe if they solve these mysteries, Anna can find her way back to her own time?

(Source: Official site, translated)

releases.title: Koupen-chan
releases.synopsis:
A baby emperor penguin, Koupen-chan, always makes sure everyone feels included. As it meets its newest friend, Koupen-chan wishes to spend as much time as possible with them and brighten up their day.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

releases.title: Hikuidori: Ushuu Boro Tobi-gumi
releases.synopsis:
The fire extinguishing samurai who stopped the great fire was called "The fire-eating bird". Matsunaga Gengo, once known as the "Fire-eating Bird", was the best fire-fighting samurai in Edo. He had resigned from the fire brigade for a reason but suddenly received an invitation to serve in the Shinjo clan. The Shinjo clan's fire-fighting team had no money and no personnel and was looked down upon by those around them. With the encouragement of his wife, Miyuki, Gengo decides to rebuild the collapsed fire-fighting clan as its chairman. Gengo and his friends, all of whom have their own peculiarities, struggle to "save any life", despite being ridiculed as "ragged steeplejacks"(= the 'Boro-Tobi-Gumi'.), In Edo, a mysterious series of suspicious fires called "foxfires" continue.

(Source: ANN)

releases.title: Princession Orchestra
releases.synopsis:
Alicepia Channel is a video sharing website exclusively for girls to share their singing, makeup, and dancing. Unbeknownst to others, users of the platform can travel to Alicepia, a secret world where time passes more slowly than reality. For Minamo Sorano and her best friend Natsu Hinoshita, Alicipia allows them to watch the idol Kagari Shirube live.

However, the upbeat atmosphere is ruined when monsters called Jamaocks attack Shirube's concert venue, causing panic in the audience. Only princesses whose hearts are filled with song can save Alicepia from the Jamaocks, and Minamo will find herself among the brave defenders of this wonderland.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

releases.title: SI-VIS: The Sound of Heroes
releases.synopsis:
SI-VIS is a co-ed music group, led by Yosuke, shaking up the global music scene with their unmatched vocals and performances. However, they are actually heroes in disguise, battling against mysterious forces threatening the world. They convert audience energy at live performances into combat power. Luckily, the battles appear to be ordinary concerts to the public, keeping their identity a secret.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

releases.title: Chibi Maruko-chan (1995)
releases.synopsis:
Momoko Sakura is an elementary school student who likes popular idol Momoe Yamaguchi and mangas. She is often called "Chibi Maruko-chan" due to her young age and small size. She lives together with her parents, her grandparents and her elder sister in a little town. In school, she has many friends with whom she studies and plays together everyday, including her close pal, Tama-chan; the student committee members, Maruo-kun and Migiwa-san; and the B-class trio: 'little master' Hanawa-kun, Hamaji-Bu Taro and Sekiguchi-kun. This is a fun-loving and enjoyable anime that portrays the simple things in life.

(Source: ANN)

releases.title: Sazae-san
releases.synopsis:
The main character is a mother named Sazae-san. She lives in a house with her husband, her kids and her parents. The show is the ultimate family program and tends to follow traditional themes. Think of this show as the Japanese equivalent to "The Partridge Family" and you'll get a good feel for this show's atmosphere. Don't expect to see things like violence, swearing, kung-fu action or magical girls. The plots are more like "Today, Sazae-san goes to the new mall and gets lost". Such "boring" plotlines and the simplistic art are often a turn-off to non-Japanese audiences, but most Japanese find the show incredibly good. As a result, it continues to be one of the top ratings grabbers on TV and is one of the few anime that is considered "acceptable" by adults. 

(Source: AniDB)

releases.title: Ao no Orchestra Season 2
releases.synopsis:
Following the regular summer concert and retirement of the third-year members, Umimaku High School's Orchestra Club shifts its efforts to the upcoming national competition with a refreshed line-up focusing on the second-year members.

Amidst the cacophony produced by the inconsistent motivation levels and understanding of their repertoire, the orchestra club members struggle to achieve their ideal sound...

releases.title: Jingai Kyoushitsu no Ningengirai Kyoushi
releases.synopsis:
I'm Rei Hitoma, a self-professed misanthrope thanks to some past trauma. Just when I thought my new teaching job in the mountains would provide a chill, rejuvenating environment, it turns out that this school is actually for demi-humans who want to become full-fledged human beings! There's a mermaid, a werewolf, a rabbit, and a bird...all of whom are now my charges. It's my duty to teach them about humankind‚Äîand maybe in the process, I'll learn a few things myself. This isn't an alternate world or a case of reincarnation. It's just the story of a teacher at a somewhat peculiar school, and his students who are striving to become human.

(Source: Yen Press)

releases.title: Yuusha no Kuzu
releases.synopsis:
By the mid-21st century, Tokyo's criminal underworld is ruled by Demon Lords‚Äîcrime bosses who have undergone ether enhancement surgery, granting them terrifying superpowers. The only ones who can take them down are Heroes, bounty hunters who boost their own ether powers using the drug E3 (E-Three). With legalized killing as part of the job, being a Hero is less about justice and more about survival.

Yashiro, known as the Reaper, is one such Hero‚Äîan independent enforcer who works alone. That is, until Jougamine, a high school girl and self-proclaimed "apprentice," forces her way into his life. Reluctantly taking her under his wing, Yashiro soon finds himself caught in a whirlwind of deadly conflicts.

(Source: MAL News)

releases.title: Digimon Beatbreak
releases.synopsis:
"e-Pulse," which is generated by human thoughts and emotions, was used as the energy source for the AI support device "Sapotama." From the shadows of this remarkable development, terrifying monsters appear. Digimon are living beings that evolve by consuming e-Pulse.

Tomoro Tenma is drawn into an extraordinary experience after meeting Gekkomon, who suddenly appears from his Sapotama. While living together with Kyo Sawashiro and other members of the bounty hunting team "Golden Dawn," Tomoro renews his resolve. What new future will be forged by humans and Digimon?

(Source: Official site)

releases.title: MF Ghost 3rd Season
releases.synopsis:
Round 3 of the MFG competition is heating up on the final race day at the Peninsula Manazuru track. Despite starting at the very front of the pack, MFG rookie Kanata Katagiri has difficulty getting the most out of his Toyota 86 GT due to an injury unknown to his competitors. Falling further behind, Kanata finds himself in a desperate situation that only stirs up unwanted memories.

At the head of the race, a vicious battle takes place between the two top drivers in the competition‚ÄîMichael Beckenbauer and Kouki Sawatari‚Äîfor the first spot on the podium. Given their aggressive and absurd driving, anyone daring to surpass either of them will have to match their level of pride until the very end. But when all hope seems lost for Kanata, a legendary competitive spirit awakens within him, and it may just push him to overcome his physical limitations and climb back to the top.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

releases.title: Hanazakari no Kimitachi e
releases.synopsis:
To most people around Mizuki Ashiya, her sudden choice to move to Japan from the United States comes as a shock. Her sole reason for the transfer is to attend the same high school as her idol Izumi Sano, who stole her heart after she saw him compete in a high jump competition. However, there is one problem‚ÄîSano attends an all-boys school! That does not stop Mizuki, though, as she is committed to getting close to Sano by changing her appearance and demeanor.

Mizuki luckily ends up in the same class and dormitory room as Sano, but her ideal plan is shattered when she finds out that he has quit high jump. Nevertheless, Mizuki is determined to learn more about him and rekindle his love for the sport, all while navigating her new life in high school and keeping her true gender hidden.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

releases.title: Medalist 2nd Season
releases.synopsis: Second season of Medalist.

releases.title: Akuyaku Reijou wa Ringoku no Outaishi ni Dekiai sareru
releases.synopsis:
On the day before her downfall, Lady Tiararose Lapis Clementille recalls that she is in an otome game that she had once played in her former life. She used to adore the main love interest Prince Hartknights Lapis-Lazuli Lactomuth, but unfortunately, she was not reincarnated as the heroine, but rather as is his worst enemy‚Äîthe villainess fianc√©e.

At their graduation ceremony, without blinking an eye, Hartknights condemns Tiararose for alleged crimes, breaks off his engagement, and proclaims the heroine Akari as his new bride-to-be. No matter whether Tiararose is innocent, he banishes her from the kingdom. But before her sentence can be carried out, a shocking figure appears. Aquasteed Marineforest, the prince of a powerful neighboring country, has been harboring feelings for Tiararose for quite some time, and announces his intention to marry her!

Adored by the prince of another kingdom, what awaits the villainess on her path to a happy ending?

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

releases.title: Kaya-chan wa Kowakunai
releases.synopsis:
Kaya-chan is infamous at kindergarten for being a troublemaker. But Ms. Chie, who's been assigned to look after her, soon discovers Kaya's hidden abilities. Get ready for the ultimate horror-action adventure set in kindergarten!

(Source: MAL News)

releases.title: Gnosia
releases.synopsis:
Saddled with amnesia, Yuuri awakens on an interstellar cruiser drifting through space. Unfortunately, a lack of memories is the least of Yuuri's problems. Among the four other crew members is a Gnosia: a Gnos infectee whose goal is the eradication of humanity. The Gnosia appears human in all other respects, so the uninfected have little choice but to vote on whom they suspect to be the enemy, hoping to neutralize the Gnosia by putting them into cold sleep. If the Gnosia survives the vote, they will eliminate one crew member during the cruiser's following warp, when only the Gnosia remains conscious.

Voting quickly proves to be an unreliable strategy, and Yuuri is left one-on-one with the Gnosia. Just when all hope seems lost, time seemingly loops back to when Yuuri first awakened. With each time loop, however, conditions aboard the ship change‚Äîneither the size of the crew nor the members' identities remain constant. Trapped in both time and space, Yuuri must figure out how to escape the loops and save humanity from the Gnosia.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

releases.title: Majutsushi Kunon wa Mieteiru
releases.synopsis:
Born blind, Kunon aims to be the first person to use water magic to create new eyes for himself. After five months of study, he has already surpassed his teacher, and continues to grow his talents. Not only can his magic help him sense color, but he can also use it to make handy items and even conjure a whole cat! Word of his skills and ingenuity soon reach the court and earn him a spot as disciple to the most powerful magician in the land. But is his ultimate goal even attainable?

(Source: Yen Press)

releases.title: Toujima Tanzaburou wa Kamen Rider ni Naritai
releases.synopsis:
Tanzaburou Toujima has spent his entire life chasing a dream: to become Kamen Rider. Now, at 40, reality has nearly caught up with him, and he's on the verge of letting go of his childhood fantasy.

That is, until he gets caught up in a crime wave led by the "Fake Shocker" gang‚Äîturning his long-time dream into something far more dangerous.

What starts as a pretend hero's journey quickly becomes something real. The ultimate Kamen Rider fantasy is about to begin!

(Source: MAL News)

releases.title: Uruwashi no Yoi no Tsuki
releases.synopsis:
Every time Yoi Takiguchi so much as lets out a sigh, her female classmates squeal in admiration and awe. She has been dubbed the school's "prince" by virtue of her boyishly attractive appearance and casual disposition. However, she chooses to be indifferent toward the attention she receives and spends her days normally‚Äîthat is, until the school's other prince, Kohaku Ichimura, waltzes into her life and calls her beautiful.

Kohaku is nothing like a prince‚Äîhe acts thoughtlessly and does as he pleases. But when he compliments her, Yoi feels flustered, and the way he looks at her gets her all nervous. He is the first boy to acknowledge her as a girl, and her attempts to distance herself prove futile as he seems to have set his sights on her. While Yoi keeps telling herself that it is nothing serious, even she cannot completely ignore the stir Kohaku causes in her heart.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

releases.title: Tamon-kun Ima Docchi!?
releases.synopsis:
Idol group F/ACE has recently risen in popularity all thanks to Tamon Fukuhara‚Äîits handsome, wild, and talented leader. Seventeen-year-old Utage Kinoshita is one of the vocal fans who greatly admires F/ACE. As her life revolves around worshiping Tamon, Utage works at a housecleaning company to earn money and continue supporting him.

When her coworker gets sick, Utage is assigned to a new client with the same name as Tamon. She believes it is merely a coincidence‚Äîuntil she comes face to face with the real celebrity! Her surprise only grows when she discovers that, unlike the extroverted superstar known to the public, Tamon is actually a gloomy guy with no friends or self-confidence.

Given that Utage's adoration for Tamon knows no bounds, she vows to keep his secret and stay by his side‚Äîbut dealing with Tamon's contrasting behaviors in and out of work might be the toughest job out there.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

releases.title: Ikoku Nikki
releases.synopsis:
Thirty-five-year-old novelist Makio Koudai never had a good relationship with her older sister Minori, who always berated her for being different. Due to this, Makio is not stricken with grief upon hearing the news that Minori and her husband die in a car crash. But when Makio is asked to identify their bodies, she runs into her 15-year-old niece, Asa Takumi, whom she has not seen in years.

As Asa struggles to process her parents' death, Makio reassures her that her complicated feelings are valid and suggests that the teenager start writing in a diary as a way to cope with the loss. Upon learning that no other relatives wanted to take in Asa, Makio decides to become her guardian despite her lack of experience. In a world full of uncertainty, the novelist and teenager must learn to live with each other while figuring themselves out.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

releases.title: Yuusha Party wo Oidasareta Kiyoubinbou
releases.synopsis:
"Orn Doula, today will be your last day in the party."

Orn, once a skilled Swordsman, had adapted to the role of Enchanter to fill a crucial gap in the Hero Party. However, one day, the party leader abruptly dismisses him, claiming his skills are lacking. Branded a "weakling" and a "jack of all trades, master of none," by his former comrades, Orn is cast out without a second thought.

Determined to start anew, he returns to adventuring‚Äîthis time as a Swordsman, the role he originally excelled in. But his time as an Enchanter was far from wasted. The experience, knowledge, and countless original spells he developed in the Hero Party have forged him into a warrior unlike any other. Now, armed with an unconventional set of skills, Orn is ready to carve his own path‚Äîone that will prove his true strength to the world.

(Source: MAL News)

releases.title: Seihantai na Kimi to Boku
releases.synopsis:
Next to Miyu Suzuki, a trendy and bubbly high school girl, sits Yuusuke Tani, a quiet and frank boy. Their interactions are brief, limited to Suzuki's unprompted random questions and Tani's succinct answers. Yet, beneath these simple exchanges, feelings of love are quietly blossoming.

Suzuki sees Tani for who he is: a straightforward boy who respects everyone equally, completely unconcerned about fitting in. Unlike Tani, she is too hung up on what everyone else thinks, desperate to keep her crush a secret. However, a slight misunderstanding leads to Suzuki confessing her feelings‚Äîand to her delight, Tani feels the same. Jittery with excitement, the young couple starts dating, embarking on a wonderful journey of friendship and love.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

releases.title: Jigokuraku 2nd Season
releases.synopsis:
Seeking the key to the elixir of immortality, the group arrives at the fortress of the island's monstrous ruler, the "Tensen." To survive and escape the island, cooperation becomes essential‚Äîregardless of whether one is a condemned criminal or an executioner.

Meanwhile, the shogunate orders additional landings on the island of the Immortal Realm, led by Shugen Yamada Asayemon. Among them are the Ishigakure clan, who share a past with Gabimaru.

Desperate to find the elixir and escape the island, Gabimaru and his companions face the Tensen in a battle that escalates into an all-out confrontation between humans and immortals!

(Source: Twin Engine, edited)

releases.title: One Piece
releases.synopsis:
Barely surviving in a barrel after passing through a terrible whirlpool at sea, carefree Monkey D. Luffy ends up aboard a ship under attack by fearsome pirates. Despite being a naive-looking teenager, he is not to be underestimated. Unmatched in battle, Luffy is a pirate himself who resolutely pursues the coveted One Piece treasure and the King of the Pirates title that comes with it.

The late King of the Pirates, Gol D. Roger, stirred up the world before his death by disclosing the whereabouts of his hoard of riches and daring everyone to obtain it. Ever since then, countless powerful pirates have sailed dangerous seas for the prized One Piece only to never return. Although Luffy lacks a crew and a proper ship, he is endowed with a superhuman ability and an unbreakable spirit that make him not only a formidable adversary but also an inspiration to many.

As he faces numerous challenges with a big smile on his face, Luffy gathers one-of-a-kind companions to join him in his ambitious endeavor, together embracing perils and wonders on their once-in-a-lifetime adventure.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
